website_summaries.verdict: An affordable stool softener that’s packed with natural fiber to help bulk up and loosen hard stools. Works as an occasional solution or to maintain everyday digestive health.
pros: Contains tried and trusted natural constipation-busting ingredients, like flaxseed, psyllium husk, pumpkin powder, and more
Proprietary blend of natural enzymes improves digestive health and balances gut flora
Dogs love the flavor and happily take it without a fight
cons: Might take a day or 2 to work

customer_reviews.title: Not effective at all.
customer_reviews.text: I have been keeping my sons miniature pinscher. He developed a hard stool that was painful, and he yelped with pain when he evacuated. I took him to my vet with the product, and he said, ( and he was right) " this is a waste of money. For a 10 pound dog, he recommended a quarter teaspoon of mineral oil. This worked like a charm. I gave this one star because there was no option for negative stars. Save you money.
customer_reviews.author: Elgis

customer_reviews.title: Worked like a charm!
customer_reviews.text: Our 12-year-old lab takes medication for arthritis which causes the unwelcome side effect of constipation. This is really tough on our Jordan so we decided to try something new to see if it worked. We had been giving him canned pumpkin which worked occasionally. We gave him his first dos of the stool ease and it worked right away. He is more regular than he's been in awhile and it's obvious he is more comfortable going. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia A. Roy

customer_reviews.title: Truly works ! Miracle help for our beloved Dog battling cancer!
customer_reviews.text: Thank you so much for making this amazing product!!! My dog is fighting prostate cancer and we tried everything to keep his stools soft and with ease to his system....and these work!!! It was so terrible for our 9 year old pup after the radiation treatments and now with chemotherapy ongoing....but, thankfully our beloved boy is doing very well with this product! In combination with a good and healthy diet, we give one and a half soft, breakable, tender chews to our 75 lb. boy every night. And, they must be good tasting because he is super picky and loves them. Thank you again for having available this great and effective product!
customer_reviews.author: Sunny Stefani

customer_reviews.title: Didn't seem to work
customer_reviews.text: I'm taking care of some dogs who only use the potty when walking. Since they been here, I'm lucky if I can get them to go once a day but more like every 2 or 3 day! I tried this product hoping for a natural way to "keep them going" without causing upset but I couldn't tell any difference. A tablespoon of pumpkin one daily seems to do the trick. The dog is a large breed so it could just be that these are just not enough to keep things moving...
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Dog loved them
customer_reviews.text: I have a 15 year old Beagle with constipation problems. I feed these with a limited ingredient dog food and they've really helped her. She's had impacted bowels before, but now is too old for anesthesia. These help and she likes them.
customer_reviews.author: jan tetzlaff

customer_reviews.title: Made all the difference!
customer_reviews.text: My border collie mix has been having issues with pooping for over a year. Constipation, straining, withholding, accidents, crying, you name it. We tried different foods, pumpkin, miralax, multiple vet exams, and antianxiety drugs, but nothing made much difference. Until THESE! He's been regular for two weeks now and no longer cries or avoids going. He weighs 50 pounds and we feed him two treats in the morning and two at night. My only complaint is that they don't come in a bigger package. Awesome product.
customer_reviews.author: Mariah

customer_reviews.title: It works.
customer_reviews.text: Our dog has an easier time going now. We give her these on a daily. Wish they came in a much larger, more economical pack as for a 40lb dog one tub is barely a 3 week supply.
customer_reviews.author: hhij

customer_reviews.title: It Definitely Works.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product to try on one of our older dogs. She was having a hard time with bowel movement moving around several areas in the yard with no relief. It solved the problem and I have ordered this product again because I mix it daily with her food to keep her regular.
customer_reviews.author: Bluebu

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Product
customer_reviews.text: I use this for my 13 year old yorkie. She’s four pounds. I put one in her food in the morning, one in the evening as well. I started using it for her two years ago. Everything else I had used prior made her gassy and/or have loose stool. This works more like a stool softener so it just makes the process easier as she ages.
customer_reviews.author: Vanja

customer_reviews.title: Don’t order in the summer. The ingredients cook and explode.
customer_reviews.text: Don’t order in the summer. The product is in the hot mail truck and then left cooking in the mailbox. My product had exploded and the seal and lid were off. The probiotics were useless when cooked.
customer_reviews.author: jenz

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves these! He has a problem with his stool getting hard all the time and ever since he takes one of these a day he hasn’t had any problems! He loves getting one which is great because he’s very picky when it comes to treats.
customer_reviews.author: Lildavidsmommie

customer_reviews.title: The ultimate treat!
customer_reviews.text: My Pomeranian eats a lot of dry food, and she was often straining to have a bowel movement. I bought the Stool Ease and it worked perfectly to alleviate the strain. I give her one a day, and her movements are solid but notably softer. And she gobbles it up as if it's the ultimate treat!
customer_reviews.author: M. Armstrong

customer_reviews.title: Rosie didn’t like the taste or smell
customer_reviews.text: I tried giving this to Rosie but she turned up her nose to it. Wrapped it in lunch meat but she ate the meat but left the stool softener on the floor. After a few more tries she finally ate it. It says to give it morning and night. So I’m waiting to see the results!
customer_reviews.author: Gee

customer_reviews.title: I’m not convinced that it’s effective.
customer_reviews.text: Pup is still scooting. She eats Stool Ease before her regular food. The product is way over priced and I’m not convinced that it’s effective. I recently received the second order. If there aren’t improvements, I will not reorder.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Pfeilsticker

customer_reviews.title: Works very well
customer_reviews.text: Definitely works. I have 3 small dogs that occasionally get constipated, especially the Papillon. Find that 1/4 "tablet" works well when I notice they are having trouble.
customer_reviews.author: Munchiniwa

customer_reviews.title: Helps keep my ole pup comfortable in his end of life
customer_reviews.text: This product, along with Lax'aire, have been a life saver for my 15 year old lab mix. He has cancer that started in his anal gland. This helps him stay regular and comfortable through the tumors and the constipating medicines. His comfort through end of life is the most important thing to me and this product helps achieve that. And he likes it!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Ratliff

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: My small dog is 14 yrs. old with arthritis. I only give him can food, no dry, with pumpkin and coconut oil. this still wasn't enough to make it easy on him. I am now giving him Stool Ease and he is able to go with ease.
customer_reviews.author: JUDY-in-VA

customer_reviews.title: Didn't ease my furbabes stool.
customer_reviews.text: The older of my two furbabes struggles with bowel movements. His waste is often hard. I wanted to help him out a bit. He won't eat pumpkin. I've tried canned, I've mixed it with food, I even made him his very own fresh pumpkin puree. I get a big fat no. I was hoping this would help. He will eat them. He loves them in fact but he still has very hard waste.
customer_reviews.author: The Jeep Diva

customer_reviews.title: Stool Ease
customer_reviews.text: I was not sure how this would work for one of our dogs that struggles to poop. It has made it less difficult for her since her stools are softer and pass a little easier.
customer_reviews.author: Leigh

customer_reviews.title: Product Really Works!
customer_reviews.text: I'm buying a second box, these really work! My Mini Schnauzer is very picky yet he likes these so I have no problem administering. The best part is that he goes shortly after he has one. Such a relief poor little guy! He has a perfectly normal bowel movement after just one. I only give him these once I notice he is having issues and they work every time. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your moneyn
customer_reviews.text: These arrived dry, hard, stale. The dog wouldn’t touch them. Even added to food it seems it made things worse. When a dog is constipated he needs moisture not something dry to dehydrate him further
customer_reviews.author: Wheels Mom

customer_reviews.title: May not work instantly, but it will work.
customer_reviews.text: Our chihuahua had to have his anal glands removed. He really struggled while healing to go poop. We tried this, and it took a few weeks to see a great change, but after using it and more healing time it definitely helped our little dog.
customer_reviews.author: Islandphoenix

customer_reviews.title: A good Vine
customer_reviews.text: I've ordered these about three times for my little boodle and it definitely has helped her
customer_reviews.author: JOANNA

customer_reviews.title: They work.
customer_reviews.text: I'll admit they do work. My dog won't eat them though. Only way I can get her to take them is breaking them up in her food bowl.
customer_reviews.author: Steve M Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: So so
customer_reviews.text: I got this because they were out of the usual fiber supplements I use. My dogs did not seem to like this one as well and there is not near the amount for your money as in the other one
customer_reviews.author: donna yates

customer_reviews.title: It actually works!
customer_reviews.text: My dog won’t poop after having surgery (or when she tries she cries). Before surgery she would only go once a day or once every other day. I’ve been giving my dog these pills twice a day with food and now she goes twice a day. If I forget to give her one, she won’t go. I will continue to buy these; they actually work like they say they do. Give your dog these & olive oil on their food before taking them to the vet for constipation; it will save you money!
customer_reviews.author: L

customer_reviews.title: Great treat/aid for potty issues
customer_reviews.text: I give these to my 2 dogs daily. They like the taste and consider them a treat. Being senior dogs (13 yrs) they have started to have some issues with not having daily BMs. This product seems to help.
customer_reviews.author: Kyra

customer_reviews.title: Although very tasty as I see my doggie devouring these ...
customer_reviews.text: Although very tasty as I see my doggie devouring these chewy things, I have not seen any improvement in my dog's bowels movement. I increased the dosage to 2 a time but don't see any difference at least on my dog.
customer_reviews.author: Real purchased

customer_reviews.title: Convenient way to get more fiber in my dog's daily life.
customer_reviews.text: I have a 15 year old Chi - otherwise still very healthy - except for occasional constipation. Once I started feeding her this product as a treat, her problems quickly disappeared.
customer_reviews.author: Cecil Latham

customer_reviews.title: Its great for someone else dog
customer_reviews.text: My dog hates it but my neighbors dog loves it he has the same problem as my dog
customer_reviews.author: Shirley Allen

customer_reviews.title: Constipation relief!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product! My Chihuahua has a problem with constipation and this has helped tremendously! I give him half each day! He doesn't even mind the taste! Great product!
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product- Pet Approved!
customer_reviews.text: I recently got a rescue who was horrendously constipated. X-rays and bloodwork were all good but she wouldn’t poop 3 days into having her. Within 36 hours of taking these she went and seems so relieved. She loves the taste of them so I plan on making them a part of her daily diet. I highly recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: Zachary Dale

customer_reviews.title: NaturVet – Stool Ease for Dogs review
customer_reviews.text: seems to work, but price is a little high - container states its a 40 day supply - misleading as thats for the smallest dog possible. It only lasts my just over 10 days making it quite expensive
customer_reviews.author: C. Gardner

customer_reviews.title: Worked Great
customer_reviews.text: Our dog was constipated for a week, and these help remedy that.
customer_reviews.author: Darla J. Mann

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t do a thing.
customer_reviews.text: Might work for yours if you’re lucky, but I gave my 9 lb. dog one of these every day for a month and they didn’t do a thing. Dog didn’t hate them, but didn’t prefer them as treats, either. Oh well!
customer_reviews.author: bookfiend

customer_reviews.title: works!
customer_reviews.text: These work better than expected. My dog is easily constipated due to an old trauma and frequently needs a little assistance. She seems to like these and they aren't expensive. I will definitely be buying again.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: They do crumble should your furry friend pick them from food like mine did
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old golden mix sufffered from severe constipation. Following the directions she was given the dose appropriate for her and her bowel movements became regular within a few days. They do crumble should your furry friend pick them from food like mine did.
customer_reviews.author: akapeapod

customer_reviews.title: Saved my dogs life
customer_reviews.text: These may have saved my dogs life. She is a lityle older and was having trouble going to the bathroom. I started her on these and within a few days she was back to normal.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Jones

customer_reviews.title: No thank you
customer_reviews.text: My dog love this little treats but it didn’t do anything for her. I gave it to her as directed and nothing but at least she liked them.
customer_reviews.author: Cristina Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: VERY DISAPPOINTED.Missing and destroyed product form amazon on delivery.
customer_reviews.text: The product is great. It would be even greater if I could actually use it, the package was so damaged and contents crushed when I received it that it was unusable.
customer_reviews.author: Firefoxx

customer_reviews.title: Works....
customer_reviews.text: My dog was having some discomfort due to constipation he is 50lbs and so i gave him two chews once daily for two days and he has been going pretty regularly again. He is back to himself...
customer_reviews.author: Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Stool Ease
customer_reviews.text: Since giving these to my shih tzu she has had no more problems with constipation. Keeps her regular
customer_reviews.author: Brenda L Fremont

customer_reviews.title: Unclogged my dog...
customer_reviews.text: It worked in less than a day. My dog thanks you!

customer_reviews.title: Excellent digestive product
customer_reviews.text: Our little maltese/miniture poodle mix has had chronic digestive problems over the years but Stool Ease is great for keeping him regular

customer_reviews.title: Came in damaged. Open!
customer_reviews.text: This came in poorly packaged and the seal was broken and the top off and contents were spilled in the package as pictured.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Helps my dogs digestion
customer_reviews.text: I give each of my shitzus half of this pill in their food each morning. I’ve noticed they are more regular. This is my 2nd order.
customer_reviews.author: Rosemari

customer_reviews.title: Love this stool softener!
customer_reviews.text: Very surprised! Worked over night and my baby is no longer straining to poop (she use to have issues pinching off when pooping and it’d essentially be stuck halfway in/out her booty hole.
customer_reviews.author: Meru371

customer_reviews.title: Great ease for your dogs
customer_reviews.text: Dogs love these and we are not having constipation issues any more . Yay!!
customer_reviews.author: TC

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for helping your dog
customer_reviews.text: This has helped my dog stay regular. She has an tumor in her rectum so it is vital that her stool stays soft. This has been key in lengthening her life.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey Suggett

customer_reviews.title: IT WORKS
customer_reviews.text: i gave up on home remedies like pumpkin and olive etc..... his poopoo was dark hard and lumpy balls.... this started working after 1 chew,, by the 3rd day he was like a new dog,,,15 yr old
customer_reviews.author: larryRocco

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work
customer_reviews.text: Didn't work. Did still constipated. Got some Vitabone treats, and those helped him for some reason.

customer_reviews.title: Meh.  Effective???
customer_reviews.text: I don't see any noticeable ease. My dog eats them but doesn't have much to say about their effectiveness.
customer_reviews.author: Charles J. Evancho

customer_reviews.title: Seem to work!
customer_reviews.text: With a 100 lb dog, I will use 4 of these per day, so they won’t last very long. But they seem to help with his digestion!
customer_reviews.author: Carson

customer_reviews.title: Would not work on this little 8 pound dog
customer_reviews.text: I tried giving Lit'l Abner one a day for a week and noticed no difference... Over the counter stool softener works much better
customer_reviews.author: David Sarti

customer_reviews.title: No Complaints From My Dog
customer_reviews.text: I let my dog test this product. She takes two willingly every morning and has never complained about the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Elementaryone

customer_reviews.title: Unlike other things I've tried he actually eats these which is great.
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves to eat things he should not and then gets constipated and these little treats work wonders. Unlike other things I've tried he actually eats these which is great.
customer_reviews.author: Miami Marty

customer_reviews.title: Good for my antique chihuahua
customer_reviews.text: Old boy gets grumpy and stiff. Started 1/2 of one of these twice per week and he’s acting 5 years younger.

customer_reviews.title: Works without Explosive Result
customer_reviews.text: Works very well and does not cause an explosive problem. Gentle but does the job. 🐕

customer_reviews.title: Seems to help our Chiw-mix
customer_reviews.text: She weights 12 lbs so we serve one a day in two installments and it seems to assist her bowels without diarrhea.

customer_reviews.title: Primo turd softener
customer_reviews.text: The old dog is regular and doesn't do that shuffle struggle valsalva anymore. I throw 1 in each bowl of food and he doesn't complain

customer_reviews.title: Dog didn't want it.
customer_reviews.text: My dog wouldn't even eat it. She smelled it and then wouldn't go close to it. Tried several times and there was NO interest.
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy Moore

customer_reviews.title: dog is happy now
customer_reviews.text: after 3 days had to stop using. going to feed him treat once a week now
customer_reviews.author: Bertbo

customer_reviews.title: Made my dog go after chewing up and (eating bits ...
customer_reviews.text: Made my dog go after chewing up and (eating bits of) a whole roll of toilet paper. Much cheaper than the $300 enema he needed!
customer_reviews.author: LittleJeans

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: My 10 year old 12 pound dog was having trouble defecating. I started her on these and they work great. She is on the 2nd container and hasn't had a problem since starting them. Her stool is soft and easy for her to go. She likes the taste. I have to adjust from a whole pill to half according to how she is eliminating. These have made life so much better for us both!
customer_reviews.author: Kate B

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works better than Laxaire. Really helps soften but no diarrhea.
customer_reviews.author: L H Ayers

customer_reviews.title: helped my dog pass fur balls
customer_reviews.text: my dog was gagging on fur balls from licking her fur too much. I fed her these only for 2 days and it helped her immediately.

customer_reviews.title: Does its job
customer_reviews.text: Our dog has trouble going to the bathroom and this certainly helps!

customer_reviews.title: Stool ease
customer_reviews.text: Had to put in food. Dog wouldn't eat it. But puppy will
customer_reviews.author: debora sayne

customer_reviews.title: Life savior
customer_reviews.text: It has helped my poor chihuahua. He is a fickle brat so I crumble it up in his food and he eats it.

customer_reviews.title: Time to reorder
customer_reviews.text: My dog likes them crumbled in her food. It seems to help

customer_reviews.title: Not effective
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to my dog to help with constipation. It didn't help at all

customer_reviews.title: Helps my dog poop!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: It works pretty good. It Helps my dog poop and my dog loves them. My dog also loves to poop. He told me one time a good poop is it's own reward.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: All dogs are different I suggest starting with one a day first these truly helped my chow who had several hard doggie poop and was yelping to go I started with 2 for his weight and it was too much now with one a day crumbled into his soft food he is doing awesome but he will not just eat it alone.
customer_reviews.author: adm

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Winnie my 10 year old mix started being constipated. She gets one in the morning and evening. She is going regularly now.

customer_reviews.title: Seems like a good product, not absolutely sure it helps
customer_reviews.text: My dog really likes them, so it's easy to get him to eat one. I'm not entirely sure it's helping his digestive system (doesn't hurt though): I've since decided his problem is that he eats too much dry food too quickly sometimes. But I've kept giving him Stool Ease just in case it does help.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: Our poor pup has a hard time "going" she seems to be having relief with these. We will continue buying.

customer_reviews.title: but he did like them as treats
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't help my senior boy at all. He's 60 lbs so I've been. Giving him 3 a day. Even tried to giving him 6 to see if it would help and it hasn't softened his stools at all. They came hard as a rock, but he did like them as treats.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Really good product my little guy needed a softner and this works great for him. He's so picky about treats and food but he loves the taste of this and eats it right up.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Christian

customer_reviews.title: stool too soft and too often
customer_reviews.text: Better to buy capsule stool softener from vet and pour capsule's contents once a day over dog's food. Stool comes out soft and clumped, not messy and not loose all over the place. Not a mess like this product sold through Amazon.

customer_reviews.title: Dog loves them

customer_reviews.title: She seems to like them and they seem to help

customer_reviews.title: they work but after a few days.

product_meta.title: NaturVet – Stool Ease for Dogs – 40 Soft Chews – Helps Maintain Regular Bowel Movements – Enhanced with Sugar Beet Pulp, Flaxseed & Psyllium Husk – 40 Day Supply
feature_bullets: Stool Ease For Dogs Soft Chews help maintain regular bowel movements.
Veterinarian formulated with a proprietary enzyme blend plus added fiber to help soften stool.
Due to an increase in daily fiber, make sure your dog drinks plenty of water.
Tasty soft chews that taste like a treat, packaged with a re-sealable cup to ensure freshness. For use in dogs over 12 weeks of age.
Wheat Free, NASC, cGMP Compliant, Manufactured in the USA
